Huge swarms of super-creepy zombies rush to kill you in this game. You HAVE to work together with the other players to survive. Lone-ranger-type solo heros need not apply. Even on Normal difficulty this game is unforgiving if you don't back each other up. Still, this makes it hugely fun when you and your team take down all the zeds and win!

Imagine Left 4 Dead with levels, unlocks, classes, brilliant accents and customizable models then you pretty much have Killing Floor.

Killing Floor is a great game in general. The music, although usually absent, helps immerse you into the apocalyptic world surrounding you. The weapons are unique and not all clones of each other, which is rare in modern FPS games (sadly). The vendor system makes sense and just plain works. The class/leveling system actually gives you a purpose to play and the map mods are more than fun.

What else is there to say? This game is far superior to Left 4 Dead and it's successor and is a must buy for those who enjoy zombie survival games.
GREAT GAME

Joguinho loco! Fora que pelo preço de promoção, saindo a menos de cinco reais, compensa e muito. É possivel jogar online ou sozinho. O jogo se resume a mantar ondas de monstro, se passar por todas, tem um chefe! Se matar ele ganha, se morrer antes babau.
Não importa o mapa ou o modo de jogo, os inimigos e o chefe são sempre os mesmos. É um jogo simples, porém divertido.

If this game is ever on sale, "BUY IT!" and snag a few DLCs while you can, but be warned this game will take a lot of your time. This games got good replayability because of how the classes and perk work.

You got your basic classes, Heavy gunner, Marksman/snipers, Medic and Support but you also have Melee and pyro/explosives experts and each one has perks that you gain as you level by playing and doing certain requirements for each class: Get so many head shots with the marksman class or heal so many points with the medic.

The game can be set on easy-normal for people starting out and then once you level up and get used to the game you can set it to hard/insane for the hardcore players.

I promise you that you will not regret buying this game and if it's on sale maybe buying the 6 pack for yourself and your 5 friends. You will have hours of fun leveling and fighting off the hordes of clones monsters (Oh I forgot to say!) These isn't your normal zombie type game, you will be fighting failed experiments and unlike zombies they are clever and require teamwork to take down many of them, such as the fleshpounder, if you piss him off then he will pound your face in.
Best zombie killing game i've encountered so far.
Who wouln't love this game?

В последнее время подсел на трэш-кино: «Бомж с дробовиком», «Мачете» и т.п. Так вот, после них, Killing Floor - то, что нужно. Кровь, мясо, летящие мозги из простреляных голов - отличный способ выпустить пар.

FPSが好き？ゾンビゲーが好き？そんなあなたにこのゲーム！無数のゾンビを薙ぎ倒す爽快感と圧倒的な物量による高難易度でコアゲーマーな私でも大満足！この機会に是非お試しください。

One of the best cooperative games I've played. Killing Floor offers addicting wave based cooperative gameplay against hordes of monstrous specimens gone wrong. The different enemy types brings a real focus to teamwork as players work together through a number of different perks (or classes) that specialize in different situations. Along with these perks are a large arsenal of weapons for each perk. Assault rifles for Commandos, grenade launchers for Demolition Experts, katanas for the melee murdering Berzerker. You name it. Despite it just being wave after wave of monsters to kill, the game does have a sense of progression as you're rewarded with money to buy better weapons and as your perks level up and grant you more benefits. The game is just pure simple gory fun but at the same time ask for a lot of strategy and teamwork. Oh yes, you shall be entertained indeed.
Très bon jeux :D

Killing Floor receives a lot of comparisons to Left 4 Dead by people who've never played it. Killing Floor is class-based, round-based, and has a bigger focus on the more unique monsters. The guns in L4D2 feel good, but the guns in Killing Floor feel great. It's louder, and darker, with some really large, spawling maps. You get money for kills and surviving, which you can use to buy better guns, in a Counterstrike twist. It's also gotten Valve-levels of post-release support. This game has been getting new maps and guns, mostly for free, since release. The DLC is all cosmetic, except for the community weapons packs.
Great game, Awful British accents! Definitely a game to play with friends!

Very intense first-person-shooter, especially at those moments when you're cornered like a rat with enemies all around you. A large amount of various maps, weapons and enemies keeps the game from becoming too monotonous. I would definitely recommend multiplayer, as this game is more fun the more people you play it with.
Awesome coop fun.
A great zombie/undead shooter even by today's standards. Graphics aren't amazing but the sound, gameplay, and everything else are.

If you like guns and killing zombie-like creatures in waves and leveling up class-like abilities at the same time, then this is the game for you!

Killing Floor > Left 4 Dead > most other zombie games.
Отличный шутер

In its current iteration (after more than 4 years of constant updates), this game is a steal for any price you can get on sale. It's got horde and objective modes, TONS of official and custom maps, a gajillion guns that feel amazing to use, and a progressing RPG-style experience system that helps extended play pay off.

Easily as good as, if not better than other co-op monster stomps like Left 4 Dead 2.
A must have game, very addicting and challenging!

Es un juego al que le echas muchísimas horas de vicio, y sus niveles y distintas clases lo hacen aún más jugable y entretenido. Pero lo malo llega cuando te pasas todas las clases y llegas al nivel 6, el nivel máximo que hay, como me ha pasado a mí. Entonces el juego se hace muy pesado y ya no te ofrece nada más. Lo bueno es que salen nuevos personajes, mapas y armas cada fecha destacada del año, y nunca están nada mal echarles un ojo. 7.5/10
A good game to kill some time.

This game is an instant classic. A tasteful combination of Left 4 Dead and the Zombies mode in Call of Duty. The gameplay hours are limitless, as no two rounds you play are alike. Personally, the system of perks that you can rank up really pulled me in, and I hope they do the same for others. The possibilities of fun are endless in this game, and it's truly a gem with friends.
Me encanto, un cago de risa para estar con amigos.

Ok, vayamos a la simplicidad del asunto. Tu quieres un juego que te ofrezca un reto justo con una buena dificultad y que además sea posible jugar con tus amigos. No se necesita tanta complejidad para saber que Killiing Floor es bastante bueno en su género, solo eliges los mapas, tu privilegio y a comenzar a sobrevivir oleadas y oleadas de enemigos hasta poder enfrentarte al Patriarca (jefe de todos los niveles), que en la mayoria de los casos desearas arrancarte el cabello porque es muy complicado sobrevivir en las oleadas finales (gracias Fleshpound >:3).
Este fue el primer juego que compré para PC y ha sido uno de los mejores, ya que ¡tiene eventos en todo el año! con nuevos mapas y modos de juego (en el último evento se comprendió al fin el modo historia que da pauta al comienzo de Killing Floor 2, asi es, ya están elaborando una segunda parte :D) y tiene muy buenos DLCs como armas o skins nuevos, así que no se porque sigues leyendo esto, compralo ya mijo
I'd say it's like Left 4 Dead but better, but Gaben would have my head on a pike...
I absolutely love this game, it's incredibly fun and it's super awesome with friends. Single player is kind of boring though, but if you're into being a boss than you might like that too.
